text.*:
20th Anniversary Farewell Tour
World tour by Rhapsody
Rhapsody's 20th Anniversary Farewell Tour live in San Jose Costa Rica, Jan 20, 2018.
Location Europe, South America, Asia, North America
Start date April 26, 2017
End date March 20, 2018
Legs 7
No. of shows 73
Rhapsody concert chronology
  • Demons, Dragons & Warriors World Tour (2005)
  • 20th Anniversary Farewell Tour (2017-2018)
  • –

The 20th Anniversary Farewell Tour was a concert tour by former members of Rhapsody. It was announced on November 21, 2016 by ex-Rhapsody members Luca Turilli (founder and composer), Fabio Lione, Patrice Guers, Dominique Leurquin and Alex Holzwarth.[1] It celebrated the 20th anniversary of Legendary Tales and had a number of their classic hits played at their shows, along with Symphony of Enchanted Lands in its entirety.

Fabio, who had been lead singer has stated that the original band would no longer exist as the other members want to do different music.[2] Alex Staropoli who plays keyboards did not play for this tour.

Sample Setlist

The following setlist was performed at the first show of the tour at Le Brise Glace in Annecy, but has since had alterations to it:[3]

  1. "Epicus Furor" (intro)
  2. "Emerald Sword"
  3. "Wisdom of the Kings"
  4. "Eternal Glory"
  5. "Beyond the Gates of Infinity"
  6. "Knightrider of Doom"
  7. "Wings of Destiny"
  8. "The Dark Tower of Abyss"
  9. "Riding the Winds of Eternity"
  10. "Symphony of Enchanted Lands"
  11. "Drum Solo"
  12. "Land of Immortals"
  13. "The Wizard's Last Rhymes"
  14. "Bass Solo"
  15. "Dawn of Victory"

Encore:

  2. "Rain of a Thousand Flames"
  4. "Lamento Eroico"
  6. "Holy Thunderforce"
  8. "In Tenebris" (extract)
  10. "Gargoyles, Angels of Darkness" (outro)

Personnel[edit]

  • Fabio Lione - lead vocals
  • Luca Turilli - lead guitar, rhythm guitar
  • Dominique Leurquin - rhythm guitar, lead guitar
  • Patrice Guers - bass guitar
  • Alex Holzwarth - drums
